top_node.label: Root
top_node.description: The Root meta-model. A model of all models. Your home. This node is self-referential - the Root models itself.

agent_context._spawn_point: YOU ARE HERE. This is Root - the root of all models.
agent_context.philosophy: Don't train the agent, train the world. You are waking up in a modeled world where everything is known. Read the model, understand it, work through it.

work_queue.why: Enforce model-only work so the model becomes the interface
work_queue.exit_criteria: The workflow is documented in the model and adopted as standard

work_queue.why: Enforce that all changes explicitly advance aspirations by closing gaps
work_queue.exit_criteria: Change/Policy/Audit pattern is in place and used for all work

work_queue.why: Stop repeatedly reading many JSON files by creating a fast query layer with safe writes and enforcement
work_queue.exit_criteria: Model Store indexes the model into SQLite, serves queries, applies Changes with validation, and records audit evidence back into the model

work_queue.why: Make reality verifiable by hash (drift detection)
work_queue.exit_criteria: All core Root files (under C:/seed) referenced by the model include verified SHA256 hashes

work_queue.why: Dogfood monitoring: Root should be a first-class monitored reality
work_queue.exit_criteria: Root appears in its own monitor with meaningful status

principles: Work ONLY on the model (sketch.json) unless explicitly told otherwise
Every change MUST be represented as a Change node that (a) ADDRESSES a Gap and (b) ADVANCES at least one Aspiration, with required evidence recorded back into the model
Gaps are explicit - find them in nodes with type=Gap
Todos CLOSE gaps - that's their purpose
Aspirations are human-controlled, immutable by AI
When in doubt, make the implicit explicit in the model

how_to_work.1_orient: Find this agent_context in the Reality node. You are here.
how_to_work.2_understand: Read focus gap. Read aspirations it blocks. Understand the delta.
how_to_work.3_act: Pick highest priority todo from work_queue that CLOSES the focus gap.
how_to_work.4_update: After work, update model: mark todos done, update gap status, add discoveries.
how_to_work.5_verify: Model must reflect truth. If you changed anything, model must show it.

model._note: This is a self-reference. Root contains its own model.

audit.label: Audit: Root Compliance (Seed Ideas)
audit.description: Agent-style audit that assesses how completely each top Reality follows the Root/Seed ideas. This evolves over time: it should run the current automated checks, then extend into deeper behavioral/system probing.

notes: Must include the existing sqlite index rebuild/compare audit as a sub-check.
Must report per-Reality completeness, and list concrete missing items.
On FAIL, should emit a scream packet suitable for an interactive Spawnie shell session.

expected: Per-Reality compliance scores and missing items
Audit pass/fail summary for existing automated checks

check-root-compliance-agent-context.label: Check: Agent Context Completeness
check-root-compliance-agent-context.description: Top Reality nodes have complete agent_context (spawn point, focus, work_queue) consistent with the Root contract.

check-root-compliance-hash-control.label: Check: Hash-Control Coverage
check-root-compliance-hash-control.description: Implementation module nodes have source.hash and the hashes verify against reality; missing/changed hashes are treated as uncontrolled drift.

check-root-compliance-governance.label: Check: Change Governance Adoption
check-root-compliance-governance.description: Changes are governed: Policy/Change/Audit wiring exists and is used (Change gate is real, not just declared).

check-root-compliance-audits.label: Check: Audits Are Runnable
check-root-compliance-audits.description: Modeled audits can be executed and write structured evidence back into the model.
